arts.ttl: Player Ratings Poll: Bayern Munich 3 - 0 Werder Bremen
arts.sum: Bayern Munich dispatched Werder Bremen by a final score of 3-0 courtesy of two Harry Kane penalties and a Leroy Sané tap-in. Awesome, then check out our Bavarian Podcast Works — Postgame Show for a review of the starting XI, a rundown of the scoring and substitutions, and some final takeaways.

arts.ttl: Daily Schmankerl: The aftermath of Bayern Munich vs. Werder Bremen; Mathys Tel still could move to Manchester United; Leroy Sané’s future could hinge on Celtic, Bayer Leverkusen performances; Real Madrid eyeing midfielder; and MORE!
arts.sum: Bayern Munich came out of halftime with a bit more of an edge to the attack and Kane ripped a shot off the crossbar in the first minute of the second half. Kane almost gave Bayern Munich the lead with a header in the first minute of added time, but it sailed wide.

arts.ttl: Amid another uninspired attacking effort, Bayern Munich execs “dream” of Bayer Leverkusen’s Florian Wirtz
arts.sum: That’s why Uli is certainly right,” Bayern Munich CEO Jan-Christian Dreesen said (as captured by Sky Sport journalist Kerry Hau via @iMiaSanMia ). Following Bayern Munich’s 3-0 victory over Werder Bremen, where the attacking group lacked bite, Wirtz became a hot topic once again.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich’s Serge Gnabry, João Palhinha miss Werder Bremen tilt
arts.sum: Bayern Munich midfielder João Palhinha and winger Serge Gnabry missed the team’s 3-0 win over Werder Bremen due to illnesses. Serge Gnabry will also miss the match against his former club Werder due to illness.

arts.ttl: Harry Kane lauds patience, scoring opener in Bayern Munich’s 3-0 win over Werder Bremen
arts.sum: They made hard work of it and drudged through a rather mundane first half of proceedings, but Bayern Munich secured another vital three points in the Bundesliga title race with their 3-0 win over Werder Bremen at the Allianz Arena. Speaking after the match, Kane spoke about the importance of being able to score the opener for Bayern after Bremen had done quite well to stifle their efforts for most of the first half.

arts.ttl: Match Awards for Bayern Munich’s run-of-the-mill 3-0 victory over Werder Bremen
arts.sum: His movement and interplay with his teammates are of the highest level, and this standard of performance will give Kompany a real headache in evaluating who should start alongside Joshua Kimmich in the midfield in matches to come. Bremen keeper Michael Zetterer was powerless to stop Bayern from winning but did manage an excellent save on a headed Dayot Upamecano chance.

arts.ttl: Spurs sign Bayern Munich forward Tel on loan
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur sign France Under-21s forward Mathys Tel from Bayern Munich on loan until the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Four Observations from Bayern Munich’s weird 3-0 win over Werder Bremen
arts.sum: Bayern Munich thought they were going nowhere against Werder Bremen, but thanks to a brace of Harry Kane penalties and a Leroy Sané tap-in the three points went to the former. Awesome, then check out our Bavarian Podcast Works — Postgame Show for a review of the starting XI, a rundown of the scoring and substitutions, and some final takeaways.

arts.ttl: Bavarian Podcast Works — Postgame Show: Bayern Munich 3-0 Werder Bremen (Bundesliga)
arts.sum: Bayern Munich got the three points it needed in a 3-0 win over Werder Bremen, but it was not necessarily an aesthetic showing for the Bavarians. Bayern Munich got the three points it needed...

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Bayern Munich 3-0 Werder Bremen
arts.sum: Bayern Munich comfortably beat Werder Bremen 3-0 to extend their lead at the top of the Bundesliga table, temporarily, to nine points. A forgettable first 45 as Bayern were expectantly…
